description: This table stores the actions taken in response to an adverse event.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the adverse event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ACTION_TAKEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the action taken in response to the adverse event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


None


Intervention Discontinued Permanently


Intervention Discontinued Temporarily


Dose Reduced


Dose Increased


Treatment Administered


Other
